data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: The typing cursor goes behind the first character as soon as he changes it
data.expected_result: You can continue editing his username
data.short_description: Your typing cursor will move behind the first character if a person you are trying to change the nickname of changes his nickname while you are doing it
data.steps_to_repro: - Have permissions to change a friend's nickname in a server - Hold on your friend's profile picture - Click Manage User - Click on the nickname box - Tell your friend to change his nickname
